title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 305.8 - Fees for services
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 305.8 - Fees for services

State Regulations
(a) Fees for
preventive alcoholism counseling services provided to a child with parental
consent may be billed to the parents. (b) Fees for preventive alcoholism counseling
services provided to a child without parental consent shall not be billed to
the parents but may be billed to the child. Such fees shall be based on the
child's ability to pay. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
305.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
